short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track cryptocurrency prices from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight extension that lets you track cryptocurrency prices from your browser. 

Conveniently monitor Bitcoin, Ethereum, and more cryptocurrency prices real-time in several fiat currencies (USD, EUR, JPY, KRW, and PHP). Light and dark theme available!
